abstract: We first introduce the concepts of regular m-polar fuzzy graphs, totally regular m-polar fuzzy graphs and complete m-polar fuzzy graphs. We investigate some of their related properties. Next, we introduce the notion of an m-polar fuzzy line graph and investigate some of its properties. Finally, we present an application of m-polar fuzzy graphs.
meta: November 2017Journal of Discrete Mathematical Sciences and Cryptography 20(8):1597-1617
